io.github.kushnirvladyslav.EventSubscribers

Class BufferedEventSubscriber

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.github.kushnirvladyslav.EventSubscriber
      • io.github.kushnirvladyslav.EventSubscribers.BufferedEventSubscriber
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    AutoCloseable

    public class BufferedEventSubscriber
extends EventSubscriber
    Event subscriber that buffers events for batch collection. This subscriber allows filtering and collecting events without immediate processing.

    Features:

    • Event type filtering
    • Batch collection of events
    • Optional automatic start
    Since:
    2025-07-31
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Vladyslav Kushnir
    See Also:
    EventSubscriber

      • subscribeEvent

        public void subscribeEvent(Class<? extends Event<?>>... eventTypes)
        Adds event types to the filter set. Events of these types will be included in filtered collections.
        Parameters:
        eventTypes - the event types to subscribe to

      • unsubscribeEvent
